length.description: Pass false to disable conversion from px to other absolute length units, such as pc & pt & vice versa.

time.description: Pass false to disable conversion from ms to s & vice versa.

angle.description: Pass false to disable conversion from deg to turn & vice versa.

precision.description: Specify any numeric value here to round px values to that many decimal places; for example, using {precision: 2} will round 6.66667px to 6.67px, and {precision: 0} will round it to 7px. Passing false (the default) will leave these values as is.
